attributes.action: Stop victims of child abuse being abused again by the Law Of Limitation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask that the Prime Minister take a look at the Law of Limitation as soon as possible, to stop it abusing us victims of child abuse once again, and allowing this Law to protect the Abusers of children in the Civil Courts.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Stop victims of child abuse being abused again by the Law Of Limitation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14338.asp

Prime Minister's Office
